meanings.sent1: The flower looked pallidest under the dim light.
meanings.sent2: Her face was the pallidest in the room.
meanings.sent3: The clown's pallidest balloon popped with a loud noise.
meanings.sent4: The pallidest sky foretold the coming storm.
meanings.sent5: The pallidest painting in the gallery failed to capture anyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: His pallidest skin showed he had been indoors for too long.
meanings.sent2: The moon cast a pallidest light on the deserted street.
meanings.sent3: The pallidest snowman in the yard melted quickly under the sun.
meanings.sent4: Her pallidest face in the photograph reminded him of happier times.
meanings.sent5: The pallidest moonlit night was perfect for stargazing.

meanings.sent1: The lecture was the pallidest part of the conference.
meanings.sent2: The book's pallidest chapter failed to engage the readers.
meanings.sent3: The pallidest joke at the party still made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His pallidest story turned out to be the most exciting one.
meanings.sent5: The pallidest movie of the year received no awards.
